summary: Summary To secure a position within an organization where I will be able to apply the extensive skills and abilities that I have acquired through my education and work experience in the advertising, marketing and social media fields. Highlights Account management Client relationship Google analytics Direct mail campaigns Fluent in Spanish well-versed on social media channels (paid and organic) trends, content development, and community engagement

experience.title: Social Media Coordinator
experience.description: Managed new product and content releases. Created and scheduled weekly content for client's professional social media accounts. Utilized Canva, Sendible, Basecamp, Google+, Cyfe and more. Managed and measured clients' social media accounts for follower analysis, reach, and growth. Prepared detailed marketing forecasts on a monthly basis. Designed, administered and launched email marketing campaigns using MailChimp. Worked effectively in a heavily cross-functional, fast-paced environment.

experience.title: Sales Associate
experience.description: Suggest key looks and incorporates the latest trends and current promotions based on the customer's individual style. Assist store in meeting and exceeding daily sales goals. Maintain company brand standards of neat, clean and organized sales floor, cash wrap, fitting room and stockroom. Partner with management on performing stock transfers, damage outs, and shipment receiving. Comply with operational standards, to include following safety policies and proper censoring of merchandise.

experience.title: Marketing Sales Intern
experience.description: Maintained Launch Trampoline Park social media accounts including Twitter, Facebook & Instagram. Promote summer events thought their social media. Vendor outreach regarding the summer program.

experience.title: Events Coordinator
experience.description: Vendor outreach providing detailed information on the event. Contacting businesses for raffles and sponsorship. Tracking In-kind gifts. Event coordination and set up. Management of volunteer activities such as shoreline cleanups.
